reviews.review: 옛날 학교 컴터실에서 돌렸던 추억 게임 이젠 아예 사람도 없고

在看相关的视频时还在感叹：“我当初是怎么在这稀饭画质中玩这么开心的？”但当你真正重拾那把熟悉的cv47，那种酣战的回忆重新涌上心头时，可能只会说——我回来了。
我回来了，虽然只有我一个。
Yılların oyunu hala devam eden bir macera küçükken internet kafelerde oynayıp saatlerce çıkmadığımız o koltuklar.. artık daha iyi...
hasn't aged well , still pretty fun if you play it with friends! i recommend buying it for the nostalgia!

Klasyczna strzelanka, świetna, najlepsza. CS:GO to sie może chować. 1.6 ma świetne tekstury, dźwięki i jest po prostu minimalistyczny. Brak niepotrzebnych rzeczy na ekranie. Jak chcecie zagrać to błagam kupcie na steam a nie za darmo pobieracie.
小的时候我能玩上一天
Con ansias esperando en modo competitivo con rangos!!
Juego de la infancia, desde el 2006.
This is the best shooting game from all times ! I have a small community who's in love with this game !
Daha önce non steam oynadım ve steam de ki fps ayarları çok güzel.
happy new year cs 1.6 lov ya

Одна из лучших игр всех времен!
Новый год через 10мин, 2021, что-то меняется, а игра все та же.
Люблю ее.
Самая топовая игра всех времён помню как проводил в ней всё своё время , я считаю что это шадевр , Valve отличная работа )))

Evet öneririm. Ama CS:GO'dan ayıran en temel özelliklerinden biri abuk subuk her yerden wallbang geçiyor. Kalın bir duvar ama awp ile sıkıp tutturursan adamı öldürebiliyorsun. Ayriyetten stabil bir sprayi yok. Biraz şans biraz tecrübe karışımı spray atmak zorundasınız. Bunlar sizi sinir krizi geçirtmezse güzel oyun.
I give just a star because the game is not working when i enter in the game everything go black
小时候一个人打人机打一整天也能乐此不疲，各种地图很多花样无穷无尽。最有意思的就是过年的时候在老家和堂哥，堂弟一起联机对打的经历。当时觉得这游戏是真的好玩，如今特地来补票。
żadna inna strzelanka multiplayer nie przebije tego klasyka
As someone who has played the nonsteam version of CS 1.6 for years before I knew what steam was, I can truly appreciate this game.
нравиться выигрывать ботов на лёгкой сложности
ta bueno pero lo malo esq no tiene bots el la version de steam
hai la un mix :)) ca pe vremuri !!!!
csgo is ok, but cs 1.6 is a legend

Este juego es un clasico 
Lo recomiendo para jugar con amigos y si tienes una pc del gobierno 
Pero si buscas un juego con graficos y fisicas un poco mejores te recomiendo el cs.source ademas que este tampoco exige tanto, con 4 gb de ram lo corres de 10

Привет это легендарная игра.
Она останется в моём сердце на всегда.
Игра для настоящих мужчин.
Рекомендую.
Игра стоит своих денег.
Можно поговорить о жизни со взрослыми мужиками)
Игра подойдёт для любого возраста.
Покупайте)
Будем играть)
Нас должно стать больше)

И ещё всех Сновым Годом!!!
Желаю вам всем хороший скил и время учиться , и играть в кс 1.6)
Всего вам наилучшего.

Depois de anos jogando o game pirata, decidi comprar o jogo aqui na steam, e adivinha? Não me arrependo de nem um real gasto, (ainda mais porque tá em promoção kk) não acompanhei a época de Lan house e tal, mas lembro como se fosse ontem meu primo me apresentando essa obra de arte, altos rages no "assault" kkkk. Mesmo passado 17 anos, ainda tem muitos jogadores ativos. Em fim, se nunca jogou esse jogo, mesmo sendo de 2003, recomendo muuito.
sene 2012 internet kafedeyim ve karşılaştık. Sonra senden ayrılamadım zaten.

пить алкоголь НЕ весело,
работа на заводе - не то чем стоит гордиться...

А в остальном игра норм.
Müqqemmel silahlar biraz daha az sekse daha iyi olcak

t's a classic game. I heard about it from friends. Also from the geography from where I am, it'd've been very likely that local kids and young adults already knew about it when I was growing up. Loved it as a kid. Learned a lot from it as well not just as gameplay. Made a lot of friends. A big part of the local (nation-wide) community is like-minded. It brings nostalgia. Too bad that it's dying over the years. Everyone moves onto something else. Being able to create/modify your own mod boosted one's intelligence as a kid. To many, this was the beginning point of their career in programming. This wasn't/isn't just a game, it's way more than that. It's my childhood and so it is to many others - a treasure of memories. One could say it's the heart of FPS games. I wish I could turn back time and relive the moments. Even the boring time. Now I am a grown up. This game will be forever with me, I'll carry it in my heart. I hope to be able to share stories about it with my children and grand-children one day. No other game could match it. More than just computer code - a platform for friendship.
